root.description: Overview Viva Pinata: Pocket Paradise is a sandbox game (like its predecessor) wherein the player turns a neglected plot of land into a beautiful, luscious garden. The game features the majority of the gameplay components and all of the pinata from the original game, although some changes have been made due to the significantly different hardware on which the game was developed for.In addition to the original 60 pinata featured in the original, the game adds 7 new pinata that were in Viva Pinata: Trouble in Paradise. These pinata are: Bispotti Chocstrich Hootyfruity Jell Limoceros Parmadillo Tigermisu
